SELECT D.DEP_ID PK_COL , D.DEP_ID , TO_CHAR(D.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , D.CRTR , TO_CHAR(D.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , D.MDFYR , D.USE_YN , D.DEL_YN , D.DEP_NM , D.DEP_HD_ID , TO_CHAR(D.DEP_CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DEP_CRT_DT , CRTR_E.F_NM CRTR_E_F_NM , CRTR_E.L_NM CRTR_E_L_NM , MDFYR_E.F_NM MDFYR_E_F_NM , MDFYR_E.L_NM MDFYR_E_L_NM , T.TM_NM FROM DEP D INNER JOIN EMP CRTR_E ON D.CRTR = CRTR_E.EMP_ID INNER JOIN EMP MDFYR_E ON D.MDFYR = MDFYR_E.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN TM T ON D.DEP_ID = T.DEP_ID WHERE D.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND D.DEP_NM LIKE '%' || #{depNm} || '%'
AND T.TM_NM LIKE '%' || #{tmNm} || '%'
ORDER BY D.DEP_ID ASC

SELECT D.DEP_ID , TO_CHAR(D.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , D.CRTR , TO_CHAR(D.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , D.MDFYR , D.USE_YN , D.DEL_YN , D.DEP_NM , D.DEP_HD_ID , TO_CHAR(D.DEP_CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DEP_CRT_DT , CRTR_E.F_NM CRTR_E_F_NM , CRTR_E.L_NM CRTR_E_L_NM , MDFYR_E.F_NM MDFYR_E_F_NM , MDFYR_E.L_NM MDFYR_E_L_NM FROM DEP D INNER JOIN EMP CRTR_E ON D.CRTR = CRTR_E.EMP_ID INNER JOIN EMP MDFYR_E ON D.MDFYR = MDFYR_E.EMP_ID WHERE D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEP_NM LIKE '%' || #{_parameter} || '%' ORDER BY D.DEP_ID ASC

SELECT D.DEP_ID , TO_CHAR(D.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEP_CRT_DT , D.CRTR , TO_CHAR(D.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DEP_MDFY_DT , D.MDFYR , D.USE_YN , D.DEP_NM , D.DEP_HD_ID , D.DEP_CRT_DT , T.TM_ID , T.TM_NM , T.TM_HD_ID , TO_CHAR(T.TM_CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TM_CRT_DT , E.EMP_ID , E.F_NM , E.L_NM , E.BRTHDY , E.EML , E.PHN , E.PSTN_PRD FROM DEP D INNER JOIN TM T ON D.DEP_ID = T.DEP_ID INNER JOIN EMP E ON D.DEP_ID = E.DEP_ID WHERE D.DEP_ID = #{_parameter} AND D.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEP (DEP_ID , CRT_DT , CRTR , MDFY_DT , MDFYR , USE_YN , DEL_YN , DEP_NM , DEP_HD_ID , DEP_CRT_DT) VALUES ('DEP-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_DEP_PK.NEXTVAL, 5, '0') , SYSDATE , #{crtr} , SYSDATE , #{mdfyr} , NVL(#{useYn}, 'N') , 'N' , #{depNm} , #{depHdId} , TO_DATE(#{depCrtDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
